fulltext:
MOHIT GOGIA 
Address: India 
PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
Creative and self-starting Front-End Developer with 5 years experience building stable eCommerce websites and 
apps in fast-paced, collaborative environments. Highly skilled in HTML5 / CSS3 / SASS / JavaScript / jQuery / 
AngularJS / Angular 7 and working knowledge of Photoshop. Well-versed in Scrum and Agile. 
STRENGTHS 
 
Implementing web design and development principles to build stable software. 
 
Bringing mockups to life using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Bootstrap and JQuery. 
 
Collaborating closely with the team to support projects during all phases of delivery. 
 
Building websites and apps that are responsive and usable. 
 
Monitoring website performance and rectifying front-end issues. 
 
Communicating technical issues in an understandable manner to the team and clients. 
 
Identifying innovative ideas and proof of concepts according to project requirements. 
 
Providing guidance and troubleshooting support to clients. 
 
Maintaining an organized workflow using a project management tool (like GitHub). 
 
Testing to identify bugs and technical issues before and after deploying. 
 
Documenting bug reports, tickets, and any code changes. 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Web Technology: HTML 4/5, XHTML, CSS 2/3, JavaScript, jQuery, AngularJS and Angular 7, Convert PSD to DIV based 
templates, Dreamweaver, Sublime, Spring tool suits, Photoshop, Bootstrap Ionic.  
Web Standards: Web Standards compliant, Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Section 508 Standard 
till Level AA, ADA compliance, Browser Compatibility, Image Optimization, Responsive Design.  
CMS: WordPress  
Framework: Laravel, Ionic  
WORK EXPERIENCE 
CampusEAI India Private Limited 
              May 2017 – Present 
UI Developer, QuickLaunch SSO, Gurgaon 
Work Profile: As a UI Developer, my major role is to look after design changes in QuickLaunch’s website and 
products. I’m actively involved in bug fixing and porting activities. 
Technologies Used: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, AngularJS, Angular 6.  
Girnar Software Private Limited 
          Dec 2015 – May 2017 
UI Developer, Auto Finance (Cardekho.com), Gurgaon 
Work Profile: As a UI Developer, my major role was to convert the designs into HTMLs ready for deployment. 
Developed many responsive websites, in addition to some M-sites. 
Technology Used: HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript, AngularJS.  
Essence Software Solutions     
          Jun 2014 – Dec 2015 
Software Engineer, Gurgaon 
Work Profile: My role was to make the project ready for developer which include integration of my HTML code in 
Laravel framework using views & controllers. And I used to customize the WordPress theme. I have used various 
third-party plugins. I have also customized some plugins. Change UI of the theme according to the requirement of 
the client. 
Technology Used: Laravel Framework, WordPress, HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, jQuery, JavaScript.  
PROJECTS 
1. QuickLaunch Identity and Access Management Solution v7: QuickLaunch is the only AI and blockchain based 
identity-as-a-service platform (IDaaS) that transforms how cloud-savvy institutions and companies manage 
human and device authentication, authorization and access control.   
 
Technologies: Angular 6, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Bootstrap  
 
Role: Frontend Development 
 
Products: Single Sign-On, Smart Password Manager, Multi-Factor Authentication, Adaptive Authentication, 
User Self-Registration, Automated Provisioning and Shield.  
 
URL: https://sso.quicklaunchsso.com/admin/ 
 
Highlights:  
 
Ideating the UI/UX for the product. 
 
Adding self-service capabilities to the product. 
 
Developing cross browser compatible application using Angular as major language. 
 
Creating the component-based modules.  
 
Minifying the JS files to optimize product speed for end users. 
2. QuickLaunch Identity and Access Management Solution v4: QuickLaunch is the only AI and blockchain based 
identity-as-a-service platform (IDaaS) that transforms how cloud-savvy institutions and companies manage 
human and device authentication, authorization and access control.   
 
Technologies: Angular JS, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Bootstrap  
 
Role: UI Development & Enhancement 
 
Products: Single Sign-On, Password Manager and Multi-Factor Authentication.  
 
URL: https://qlsso.quicklaunchsso.com/admin/ 
 
Highlights:  
 
Revamping the UI/UX for existing product. 
 
Making the product responsive and cross-browser compatible. 
 
Developing a self-service product adhering to following web standards - Web Content Accessibility 
Guidelines (WCAG) 2.0, Section 508 Standard Level AA, ADA compliance 
 
Developing cross browser compatible application using Angular as major language. 
3. Auto-Finance Portal (Gaadi.com) UI Design & Development: Gaadi.com is a one-stop shop to buy/sell used cars. 
It also provides pre-approved loans to the customers looking to buy used/new cars from the website. Being 
there in the industry for 10 years, Gaadi has become the major player in used car market. 
 
Technologies: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Bootstrap  
 
Role: UI Design & Development 
 
Products: Auto-Finance Portal 
 
URL: https://axis.gaadi.com/ & https://hdfcbank.gaadi.com/ 
 
Highlights:  
 
Ideation of website user interface. 
 
Adding end-user capabilities to website framework. 
 
Creating homepage assets for both desktop and mobile experiences. 
 
Presenting concepts inline with company branding guidelines to the creative team. 
EDUCATION 
KIIT College of Engineering, Maharishi Dayanand University, Gurgaon  
           Jun 2012 – May 2015 
Post Graduate Program in Computer Application (MCA) 
KIIT College of Engineering, Maharishi Dayanand University, Gurgaon   
Bachelor’s in computer application (BCA) 
            Aug 2009 – Jun 2012  
ACHIEVEMENTS 
“Second Position” in Graduation (KIIT) 
“Employee of the Quarter” Award for the Q4, 2017 (CampusEAI) 
“Employee of the Quarter” Award for the Q3, 2018 (CampusEAI) 
PERSONAL INFORMATION 
Father’s Name  
:    Mr. Ashwani Kumar Gogia 
Date of birth 
:    21st August 1990 
Nationality 
:    Indian 
Marital Status  
:    Unmarried 
Hobbies 
:    Badminton, Listening to Music, Travelling, Hiking 
Strengths 
:    Determination, Adaptive, Understanding, Hardworking, Patience, willing to learn & team 
performer 
DECLARATION 
I, Mohit Gogia hereby solemnly declare that all the above information is correct to the best of my knowledge and 
faith. 
Date: 
Place:   
(MOHIT GOGIA)
